title: Riot .... This is Unacceptable
body:
[IMG]http://i65.tinypic.com/xfwbw8.png[/IMG] 


This problems occurs all the time, So far I have lost 30LP and i now have a 20 wait time for 5 games which I DID NOT Deserve

replies.body: they dont give a fuc* lol they just want your money from skins thats all

The way i get around this (It happens every 4 games or so for me), is i open task manager and force close the client then when the launcher pops up i force close that as well (in the task manager, this is important) that way it sees it as a Internet DC or a Bug splat maybe instead of me actually clicking out. Then i re-open the launcher, login, click reconnect and it works fine.

This is the only way i can get it to work for me. I thought maybe it was something with my ISP but recently ive been having to use a VPN to route my traffic for every game as my ping went from 39ms to 480ms consistently with Time Warner Cable but goes back down to 39MS now with a VPN. But it still happens either way, even on my normal ISP connection or with the VPN Routing i still get this bug constantly.

It's not an every game thing for me, i could play 10 games in a row, and then get that error. And that one error starts my leavebuster ALL over again. So then what. The problem is fixed now for one game how do we fix it forever answer me that please.
